name: auth-biometric
description: Biometric authentication UI using WebAuthn API with fingerprint/face recognition
postMessage: Import and use: import { BiometricAuth } from './components/auth-biometric/BiometricAuth'; <BiometricAuth mode='register' userId='user-123' userName='jane@example.com' onSuccess={cred => console.log(cred)} onError={err => console.error(err)} />
